name: UpdateSitePagesBatch
description:
Batch update specified site pages in HubSpot CMS.

Use this tool to update multiple site pages in HubSpot CMS based on identifiers provided in the request body. It should be called when you need to make bulk updates to site page objects.

parameters.name: site_pages_update_data
parameters.description: A JSON object containing the updated site page details, including the identifiers and new values for each site page to update.

value_schema.description: The JSON representation of the updated Site Pages.

parameters.name: update_deleted_site_pages
parameters.description: Specify true to update deleted Site Pages. Defaults to false.

value_schema.description: Specifies whether to update deleted Site Pages. Defaults to `false`.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the hubspot_cms API.

parameters.name: archived
parameters.description: Specifies whether to update deleted Site Pages. Defaults to `false`.

value_schema.description: Specifies whether to update deleted Site Pages. Defaults to `false`.

parameters.name: requestBody
parameters.description: The JSON representation of the updated Site Pages.

value_schema.description: The JSON representation of the updated Site Pages.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
